description:
1.Love is not a matter of counting the days. It's making the days count.

爱情不是数着日子过去，它让每个日子都变得有意义。

2.First love is unforgettable all one's life.

初恋是永生难忘的。

3.No words are necessary between two loving hearts.

两颗相爱的心之间不需要言语。

4.Wherever you go, whatever you do, I will be right here waiting for you.

无论你身在何处，无论你为何忙碌，我都会在此守候。

5.Passionate love is a quenchless thirst.

烈的爱情是不可抑制的渴望。

6.May your love soar on the wings of a dove in flight.

愿你的爱乘着飞翔的白鸽，展翅高飞。

7. But if the while I think on thee, dear friend, all losses are restored, and sorrows end.

只要我一想起你，亲爱的人，所有的失落和遗憾烟消云散。 

8.Just because someone doesn’t love you the way you want them to, doesn’t mean they don’t love you with all they have. 　

爱你的人如果没有按你所希望的方式来爱你，那并不代表他们没有全心全意地爱你。

9. Never frown, even when you are sad, because you never know who is falling in love with your smile.

纵然伤心，也不要愁眉不展，因为你不知是谁会爱上你的笑容。

10. Never frown, even when you are sad, because you never know who is falling in love with your smile.

就算你不快乐也不要皱眉，因为你永不知道谁会爱上你的笑容。

title: 英语爱情名言：爱情不是数着日子过去

description:
1.New love is brightest, and long love is greatest; but revived love is the tenderest thing known upon earth. 

新生的爱情殉丽多彩，长久的爱情崇高伟大；但复苏的爱情则是世界上最温柔的事情。

2.The good life is one inspired by love and guided by knowledge. 

美好的生活是一种由爱激励和由知识指导的生活。

3.Don’t try so hard, the best things come when you least expect them to. 　

不要着急，最好的总会在最不经意的时候出现。

4.With the wonder of your love, the sun above always shines.

拥有你美丽的爱情，太阳就永远明媚

5.Every man is a poet when he is in love. 

每个恋爱中的人都是诗人。

6. Friendship is like earthenware: once broken, it can be mended; love is like a mirror: once broken, that ends it.

友谊就像陶器，破了可以修补；爱情好比镜子，一旦打破就难重圆。

7.You don’t love a woman because she is beautiful, but she is beautiful because you love her.

你不会因为美丽去爱一个女人，但她却会因为你的爱而变得美丽。

8.Your kiss still burns on my lips, everyday of mine is so beautiful. 

你的吻还在我的唇上发烫，从此我的日子变得如此美丽。

9.Love's tongue is in the eyes.

爱情的话语全在双眼之中。

10.Love is an active power in man, a power which breaks through the walls which separate man from his fellow men which unites him with others; love makes him overcome the sense of isolation and separateness, yet it ermits to be himself, to retain his integrity. 

爱是活跃于人心中的一种力量，它冲破人与人之间的隔阂，是我们紧紧相连；它使我们战胜孤独无助，但仍使我们保持自我个性的独立完整。
